tool_description: Weatherly is a simple and efficient weather forecasting API. It provides real-time weather information such as temperature, humidity, and wind speed for any given city. Built with Python and Flask, Weatherly leverages the OpenWeatherMap API to fetch the latest weather data. It’s an excellent tool for developers who need to integrate weather data into their applications or services.
name: Weatherly
title: Weatherly
